summary: Nikola founder Trevor Milton has been formally accused of sexual abuse by two women who told police he touched them when they were 15. The allegations date back more than 15 years ago.

summary: A new UCSF study has found that time-restricted eating, a health fad with many adherents in Silicon Valley and Hollywood, doesn't seem to help people lose weight.

summary: The announcement brings Google Play's policies in line with Apple's App Store policies, which have come under fire from developers and regulators over several issues, including its own 30% cut.

Apple engineers designed a custom face mask for employees — take a look
summary: Apple has designed a reusable, disposable face mask for employees to wear during the pandemic. The face masks look like a typical Apple product, with a minimalist design and  packaging. Apple told Bloomberg that the company researched and tested effective materials that wouldn't put further strain on the supply chain for personal protective equipment.
